body:
**See thread on XDA for more info: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1304656**

##Changelog
**MultiROM v19** - 27th March 2012 19:03

* Implement true sleep mode, instead of just turning of the screen
* http://www.mediafire.com/?4q1op96bjvx2cdp - multirom_v19-signed.zip


**MultiROM v18** - 27th March 2012 14:17

* Implement charger screen. It shows charging progress and can replace LG's charger screen
* Implement misc menu. It replaced tetris on main screen and you can choose in it between charger, tetris and reboot.
* Read http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=24098891#post24098891
* http://www.mediafire.com/?6t7dve2hls5yf6o - multirom_v18-signed.zip


**MultiROM v17** - 9th March 2012 21:48

* Add possibility to set sd card as default boot location
* Fix bug in "Create from ZIP" option in recoveries (it did not work if there was whitespace in ZIP's name)
* New MultiROM Manager and recoveries were released
* See this post for more info: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=23445674#post23445674
* http://www.mediafire.com/?3xhmxzbsxbxf7ps - multirom_v17-signed.zip


**MultiROM v16** - 9th February 2012 14:24

* Reboot to recovery on back key press
* Implement sort-of sleep mode on power key press. Long press still turns the phone off
* http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=22345703#post22345703
* Fix display brightness setting on .32 kernel
* http://www.mediafire.com/?0cdjmyurfhgjd7p - multirom_v16-signed.zip


**MultiROM v15** - 4th February 2012 20:59

* Hide "New high score" text in tetris on tetris restart
* Implement "Create from ZIP" recovery command, see http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=22194117#post22194117
* Look below for new recoveries
* http://www.mediafire.com/?x85c8e5x222c5ev - multirom_v15-signed.zip


**MultiROM v14** - 14th January 2012 21:59

* Fix usb mass storage in boot manager for .35 kernels
* http://www.mediafire.com/?dwze92drc8s1ymx - multirom_v14-signed.zip


**MultiROM v13** - 5th January 2012 20:13

* Implement brightness setting - http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=21063210#post21063210
* Properly close framebuffer and exit input thread while booting from sd-card - **Fixes misplaced screen bug with .35 ROMs on sd-card**
* http://www.multiupload.com/47O0A7OVG6 - multirom_v13-signed.zip


**MultiROM v12** - 26th December 2011 20:24

* Add high score into tetris
* http://www.multiupload.com/R5U64HJSCO - multirom_v12-signed.zip


**MultiROM v11** - 20th December 2011 20:26

* Add support for touchscreen - http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=20510312#post20510312
* Redesigned main screen
* **(Update on 21.12) **- mount /system read-only
* http://www.multiupload.com/VZPSZHLUDT - multirom_v11-signed.zip


**MultiROM v10** - 14th December 2011 20:33

* Fix CM7 root issue - http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=20300818#post20300818
* http://www.multiupload.com/7KXVNSMP60 - multirom_v10-signed.zip


**MultiROM v9** - 6th December 2011 19:04

* Show time and battery status in boot manager (thx arnab321 for idea)
* Add config file - http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=20045183#post20045183
* Implement USB Mass Storage - just press "search" while on boot manager main screen
* Further improvements to install .zip - it will no longer break boot sector if installation fails and some minor things
* http://www.multiupload.com/QCAPOR5YFX - multirom_v9-signed.zip


**MultiROM v8** - 4th December 2011 18:00

* Implement Tetris into boot manager - http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=19977643#post19977643
* Add size check to install zip - print error if generated boot image is too big
* http://www.multiupload.com/G6AB99C1BT - multirom_v8-signed.zip


**MultiROM v7** - 25th November 2011 21:02

* Implement framebuffer drawing code (-> visual changes)
* Remove unused init.rc commands
* You can now boot backups of ROMs on sd-card from boot manager (see http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=19695138#post19695138)
* http://www.multiupload.com/7K0YX4RIN1 - multirom_v7-signed.zip


**MultiROM v6** - 9th November 2011 23:41

* Some visual changes to boot manager
* Minor fixes
* See below for new AmonRa recovery
* http://www.multiupload.com/ECLXQ2819B - multirom_v6-signed.zip
* **DO NOT USE, somethings broken here, use v5 instead**


**MultiROM v5** - 31st October 2011 20:45

* Simple boot manager, see http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=18932240#post18932240
* http://www.multiupload.com/H3EVL9V50B - multirom_v5-signed.zip


**MultiROM v4** - 20th October 2011 22:31

* Copy also default.prop from boot.img 
* Reflash recovery, it was updated
* CWM recovery added
* http://www.multiupload.com/HHOS8K48U3 - multirom_v4-signed.zip


**MultiROM v3** - 18th October 2011 22:41

* Support for Gingerbread as main ROM (the one in internal memory)
* Fix installation package so that it creates /sd-ext/multirom folder
* http://www.multiupload.com/QMD4TG8HGB - multirom_v3-signed.zip


**MultiROM v2** - 18th October 2011 04:35

* Support for CM7(tested) and Gingerbread ROMs (guessed, should be the same problem as CM7)
* http://www.multiupload.com/QV1EHQP5VS - multirom_v2-signed.zip


**MultiROM v1** - 17th October 2011 23:54

* Initial release
* http://www.multiupload.com/3E80YS8KUQ - multirom_v1.zip
name: Multirom
tagline: init binary of MultiROM mod for LG Optimus One
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
